Communist Party of the United States of America Records

This series represents the broad efforts the CPUSA made towards educating Party membership and the working class population on the fundamentals of communism, socialism, and the history of the CPUSA as a whole. Correspondence, internal discussion documents, and meeting minutes found in this series are a rich resource for understanding the beliefs and goals of Party leadership; the detailed course guides found in Subseries A and B that were produced for Party run and Party affiliated schools are particularly illuminating, as they lay out these ideas in explicit terms. Audio recordings in Subseries B include tapes of lectures and discussions from CPUSA national educational bodies. Recordings were produced predominantly by the National Party School and Regional School. There are also several tapes from the People's School for Marxist Studies.
